Methodology Planning iterations for effective design and development of the Modules Designed and developed web based UI using JSP StrutsTaglibs and developed action classes to handle the user request and Transaction management features to handle the transactions and business logic Used DAO design pattern to handle the interaction with Data base MySQL Server and Hibernate as ORM to map Java classes side components using testing frame works like HTTPUnit and Junitalso Tested components using JunitMockitoduring development Developed automated Build files reporting and documentation using Maven
